channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: To Zaboga, It's Brill in Tirisfal Glades, the undead newbie area.
item.content:encoded: To Zaboga, It’s Brill in Tirisfal Glades, the undead newbie area.

item.title: By: zaboga
item.dc:creator: zaboga
item.description: btw, where is the location of that town in your banner? looks like an alliance town but i don't recognize it.
item.content:encoded: btw, where is the location of that town in your banner? looks like an alliance town but i don’t recognize it.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Demon Fall Canyon, Ashenvale, the extreme southeast corner of the map. Not an island, but short ride/run from Splintertree (Horde) or Azshara (Alliance).
item.content:encoded: Demon Fall Canyon, Ashenvale, the extreme southeast corner of the map. Not an island, but short ride/run from Splintertree (Horde) or Azshara (Alliance).

item.title: By: Eradon
item.dc:creator: Eradon
item.description: If I remember correctly, It's down in the right corner of the Ashenvale map. On a kind of triangle shaped island, not far from the Horde base.
item.content:encoded: If I remember correctly, It’s down in the right corner of the Ashenvale map. On a kind of triangle shaped island, not far from the Horde base.

item.title: By: ratmaggot
item.dc:creator: ratmaggot
item.description:
I'm lost. Been looking around Darkshore / Ashenvale for hours. Sorry to sound like LFG but...
/4 anyone got coords?
item.content:encoded:
I’m lost. Been looking around Darkshore / Ashenvale for hours. Sorry to sound like LFG but…

/4 anyone got coords?

item.title: By: Nonentity
item.dc:creator: Nonentity
item.description:
Hm, looks like Darkshore or Ashenvale.
If I remember correctly, right as you head south from Darkshore to Ashenvale, it's to the east of the road.
item.content:encoded:
Hm, looks like Darkshore or Ashenvale.

If I remember correctly, right as you head south from Darkshore to Ashenvale, it’s to the east of the road.

item.title: By: nordee
item.dc:creator: nordee
item.description: I never saw it until I did the "Autumn Festival" Horde quest thingy a couple weeks ago, after running through Ashenvale with three or four Alliance characters.
item.content:encoded: I never saw it until I did the “Autumn Festival” Horde quest thingy a couple weeks ago, after running through Ashenvale with three or four Alliance characters.

item.title: By: Steven
item.dc:creator: Steven
item.description:
Is that that place in ashenvale?
I never saw it until i was wandering around with my 60...still have never quested there...
item.content:encoded:
Is that that place in ashenvale?

I never saw it until i was wandering around with my 60…still have never quested there…
